title: The Blind Spot in the Share House

sections.Resolution: As evidence he points out the shampoo which dripped off Yasuko's body, since she murdered Katsuko while she was completely nude when she was pretending to shower, as well as a wound on her left arm which she inflicted onto herself unintentionally by cutting herself on a nail, which was hanging on the wall and can be analyzed to reveal the blood on it to be hers.
